tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE yield (
    yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    yield_amount FLOAT,
    yield_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region(region_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trend (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    yield_id INT,
    trend_analysis TEXT,
    trend_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (yield_id) REFERENCES yield(yield_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regions (
 region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 region_name VARCHAR
)
